title: Josh Gets Glasses
description: In Josh Gets Glasses, Josh is not happy about the prospect of wearing glasses. Josh's eye doctor explains that wearing glasses helps people perform their jobs and helps children do better in school. Josh decides that he might like wearing glasses after all.
reviewWords: airplane, basketball, cattle, cowboys, doctor, firefighters, glasses, people, police officers, score
comprehension: Problem and Solution                : Identify the problem and solution in a story
awareness: Segment Syllables                : Orally segment words into syllables
wordWork: Compound Words                : Read and understand compound words
